snippet.title: Battle Wizards final trailer
snippet.description:
Hop on to the Battle Wizards academy! This local multiplayer game of explosive action will have you throwing fireballs, summoning fiery dragons and striking lightning at your friends. Journey through 10 different levels as you unlock the spells in a gradual learning experience.

Out on August 5th 2020 at https://aldenwar.itch.io/battlewizards !
